"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"The pattern that appears is every time "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"9"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" ones are added, the sum of its digits increase by "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"9^{2}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (after the number is squared). While every individual "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" added, increases the value being squared by "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (after the number is squared). Using this, we can divide the number of ones "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"N"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" has, by "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"9"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":". This leaves us with: "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2018"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" = ("},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"224"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" x "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"9"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":") + "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":". So the final equation will have to include the "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"224"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" sets of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"9^{2}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and also "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2^{2}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" for the remainder of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"bulletList","content":[{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"text","text":"This will be the final equation: ("},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"224"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" x "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"9^{2}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":") + "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2^{2}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" = "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\boxed{18148}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}
